results.name: FastStats - Access to Health Care
results.description: <entered by Bill> Data are for the U.S.
results.content:
Access to Health Care

Data are for the U.S.

  • Percent of persons who failed to obtain needed medical care due to cost: 5.3%
  • Percent of persons with a usual place to go for medical care: 87.9%

Source: Early release of selected estimates based on data from the 2014 National Health Interview Survey, data tables for figures 2.2 and 3.2 [PDF - 933 KB]
